value:
$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|I'll cut that dastard Walhart down
myself! I swear it before the gods!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-where did he go? Tracking a foe
who can fly is no easy task!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The last I saw of him, he was moving
across the sky in that direction, so
we should move that way as well.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Wait a minute, you two! This is our
border with Embla in front of us.$k$pAnd if scouting reports are accurate...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What do they say?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That fortress up ahead... It's held
by a specialized group of Emblian
troops—not much else is known.$k$pWe only know that they function
independently of the Emblian army.$k$pTo put it simply, you could call them
Embla's Order of Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Embla has an Order of Heroes?!$k$pIn that case, we should be able to
get along, right? Since we have so
much in common, I mean.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I'm not so sure... Outside of Embla,
they've earned themselves another
name: the Curse Directive.$k$pThis is the heart of Embla's research
into the dark arts.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The Curse Directive? That does
make them sound much scarier...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|According to the information I have,
fear is appropriate.$k$pThey use assassination, abduction,
torture, treachery...even the spread of
false information to their own people.$k$pThey operate in every shadowy
corner in Embla, and do so without
any obstacle from the empire.$k$pIf we get any closer than this, there
is a real danger we will be forced to
engage them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You're right. If we cross into Embla's
territory without clear cause, it may
sour our cooperative relationship...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...H-hey! Look over there! Coming out
of the forest near the fortress!$k$pBat wings! That must be our target!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hang on—is someone being attacked?
...Is that Princess Veronica?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|She's in trouble! We have to
help her...now!$k$p$Sbs150|
